item.title: [PI] Getting teleports to not require runes [PI]
item.dc:creator: @we_rushed_god we rushed god
item.description:
@we_rushed_god wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:13, topic:416180”]oooh put the “return;” after the “c.sendMessage(” “);”

[code]case 4140: //varrock
if (c.inWild()) {
c.sendMessage(“You cannot teleport there while in the wild”);
return;
}

                    c.getPA().startTeleport(3214, 3424, 0, "modern");
                    c.sendMessage("Rock Crab Island.");
                    break;[/code][/quote]

Lol, ok, thanks, i thought about trying that b4 but i never did xD Thanks man
I appreciate u taking ur time to help me figure it out

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Getting teleports to not require runes [PI]
item.dc:creator: @we_rushed_god we rushed god
item.description:
@we_rushed_god wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:11, topic:416180”]“Unreachable” Believe that means you put that message outside of the statement.

Like

[code]case 4140:
//Shit it does…
break;

c.sendMessage(“You cannot teleport there while in the wild”);

case 4141:
//Shit 4141 does?
break;[/code][/quote]

no it doesnt say break; before the message appears D:

case 4140: //varrock if (c.inWild()) { return; c.sendMessage("You cannot teleport there while in the wild"); } c.getPA().startTeleport(3214, 3424, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Rock Crab Island."); break;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Getting teleports to not require runes [PI]
item.dc:creator: @we_rushed_god we rushed god
item.description:
@we_rushed_god wrote:

[quote=“Vhenom, post:2, topic:416180”][quote]case 4140: //varrock
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(554,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(556,3)) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(3214, 3424, 0, “modern”);
c.getItems().deleteItem(563,c.getItems().getItemSlot(563),1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(554,c.getItems().getItemSlot(554),1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(556,c.getItems().getItemSlot(556),3);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You do not have the required runes for this spell.”);
}
break;[/quote]
Take out the part in red, so you don’t need runes. But if you can’t do at least that, then dude its gonna be hard to start from a blank source.[/quote]
Lol, i’ve been coding for a while. i just never used a blank source so i didn’t know how to change teles Thanks Though i thought thats what i needed to do too xD

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Getting teleports to not require runes [PI]

item.title: [PI] Getting teleports to not require runes [PI]
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

case 4140: //varrock if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(554,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(556,3)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3214, 3424, 0, "modern"); c.getItems().deleteItem(563,c.getItems().getItemSlot(563),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(554,c.getItems().getItemSlot(554),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(556,c.getItems().getItemSlot(556),3); } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have the required runes for this spell."); } break;

Wait, you want them not to require runes?
Than it would look like this, if i’m posting what you don’t need let me know.

case 4140: //varrock if (c.inWild()) { return; c.sendMessage("You cannot teleport there while in the wild"); } c.getPA().startTeleport(3214, 3424, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Welcome to Varrock."); break;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Getting teleports to not require runes [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

case 4140: //varrock if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(554,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(556,3)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3214, 3424, 0, "modern"); c.getItems().deleteItem(563,c.getItems().getItemSlot(563),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(554,c.getItems().getItemSlot(554),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(556,c.getItems().getItemSlot(556),3); } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have the required runes for this spell."); } break;
Take out the part in red, so you don't need runes. But if you can't do at least that, then dude its gonna be hard to start from a blank source.

item.title: [PI] Getting teleports to not require runes [PI]
item.dc:creator: @we_rushed_god we rushed god
item.description:
@we_rushed_god wrote:

Ok, i used a blank source and have been working on it for a while now. Just got to the teleports and i will soon be adding the interfaces… But first… I have a problem. I want the teleports to not require runes. Heres the code. ^.^

Spoon feed me xD jk But a code would be handy dandy

case 4140: //varrock if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(554,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(556,3)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3214, 3424, 0, "modern"); c.getItems().deleteItem(563,c.getItems().getItemSlot(563),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(554,c.getItems().getItemSlot(554),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(556,c.getItems().getItemSlot(556),3); } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have the required runes for this spell."); } break;
